Next AI: Bringing AI Power to ERPNext

Next AI is a smart extension of ERPNext & Frappe, designed to enable AI-driven capabilities across the ERP ecosystem. It enhances user productivity with intelligent content generation, grammar correction, and contextual content improvement.

By embedding AI directly into the ERPNext experience, Next AI aims to streamline communication and automate routine writing tasks—making ERP smarter, faster, and more efficient for everyday business use.
